name: Queen of the Tofus
description: The more Tofus, the merrier! Since she was a nipper, Jubyl has just loved Tofus. She knows all there is to know about them: the number of feathers they have, the size of their beaks, and to top it all off, she speaks fluent Tofu too! Her dream is to reach her Diamond Jubilee.

spells.effects: Inflicts +1 {A} per TOFU adjacent to the target.
Summons a TOFU on the targeted empty cell.

powers: Critical Hit ,  Dodge

name: King of the Gobballs
description: Gobball it all up This farmer, who also happens to be a fervent protector of the countryside, has declared himself the King of the Gobballs! He spends so much time with his dear beasts that he's become just as stubborn as them! His mood swings have earned him the nickname "Grumpy Wumpy".

spells.effects: Inflicts +2 {E} when a GOBBALL is adjacent to the target of the spell.
Summons a GOBBALL on the targeted empty cell.

powers: Armour ,  Lock

name: Boo Ming
description: Tick, tick, tick, Boo! This Rogue is just about the worst crook around! Not content with the simple act of breaking and entering, he prefers to blow the place to pieces after stealing from honest citizens. He loves it when people talk about him, and you can be sure that you'll have a blast when Boo's around.

spells.effects: Places a GRENADO on the targeted empty cell.

powers: {A} Resistance

name: Bad Aboum
description: Smoke on the water This Rogue has an explosive temperament...So much so that his family sent him down to the tunnels under their temple where he now escorts people from Astrub to Amakna and back. He keeps the home fires burning...

spells.effects: Retreats 1 .
Places a WATER BOMB on the targeted empty cell.

powers: Lock ,  Dodge

name: Remington Smisse

spells.effects: Pierces Armour .
Inflicts +1 {F} per {MP} and {AP} remaining. Remington loses al his {MP} and {AP}.
Places a FIREBOMB on the targeted empty cell.

powers:
Dodge ,  Shushus a-Gogo
( Shushus a-Gogo: if Remington Smisse has inflicted at least 1{ij} on a Krosmaster, he heals himself by 1{ij} at the end of his turn. Otherwise, he suffers 1{ij}.)

name: Maskun John
description: Heeeere's John...! Maskun John has a very peculiar way of life: he rejects technomagic in all its forms and leads a very simple existence away from the temptations of the World of Twelve. There's no chance of finding him in a tavern enjoying a good tankard full of Bamboo Milk! Horrified Pandawas ask themselves which Moofly bit his bottom...

spells.effects: Steals Health . Attracts 1 .
Pushes 1 .

powers: Armour

name: Kassius Kaos
description: So mean he makes skeletons sick Kassius Kaos wanted to be a minstrel, but his voice made ears bleed and birds flee... Now he makes music on the battlefield, stinging like a bee! Remember, your spells can't hit what your eyes can't see...

spells.effects: Pushes 3 .

powers: Critical Hit

name: Victor don Voom
description: Taking centre stage This don-of-disguise Masqueraider formerly tried for a career in theatre. Unfortunately, his first four pieces were fantastic flops!

spells.effects: Moves 1 closer to the targeted character.
-1 {MP} .

powers:
Critical Hit ,  Lock ,  Speedy Aura
( Speedy Aura: at the end of Victor don Voom's turn, any Krosmaster allies standing next to him gain +1{MP}.)

name: Bill Tell
description: Keep a cool head Bill Tell didn't have an easy childhood... Growing up, he was nicknamed "Cawwot Top". Being the good sport that he was, he never fought back! But today, Bill is a changed man: the bullies that teased him are soon going to be plucked out like rotten Apis!

spells.effects: For this turn, Bill Tell's spells gain +3 max Range , but he loses al his {MP}

powers: Dodge

name: Jems Blond
description: The Cra with the golden bow This golden-fingered archer is on his majesty Allister's service and has a license to kill. Be careful he doesn't knock the living daylights out of you!

spells.effects: "Cross" area of effect.
"Square" area of effect.

powers: Dodge ,  {F} Resistance

name: Luk Ylook
description: A lonely little Cra... Some people say that Luk Ylook can shoot arrows even faster than his shadow, that he's able to take out three enemies at once and that he can hit the bull's-eye from kilokametres away. But the truth is that Luk Ylook just makes a hash of it! Fortunately for him, he can settle his own...

spells.effects: -1 {MP} . -1 {AP} .
Pushes 2 .

powers: {E} Resistance ,  {W} Resistance

name: Lil Healey
description: Couldn't care more Lil Healey is always ready to lend a helping hand - the smallest graze and she's there! Whether it's for gaping hole in the head or a sprained big toe, her allies can count on her! So much so that she can become a pain in the neck herself...!

spells.effects: Pierces Armour .

name: Ally McZeal
description: An antsy Eniripsa Ally McZeal is incredibly popular amongst adventurers... But she can't quite fathom why! People around her just seem to throw themselves at her! Why do they find her so interesting? She's given up caring!

spells.effects: Steals Health .
"Cross" area of effect.

powers:
Motivation
( Motivation: at the end of Ally McZeal's turn, any Krosmaster allies standing next to her gain +1{AP}.)

name: Di Curey
description: Cheers! Some Pandawas allow themselves a little blip in their diet for a cheeky pick-me-up. Others turn to their dear friend Di Curey. Basically, whatever she says, people around her drink it up. Her permanent good mood and eloquence form an effective cocktail to get you going in the right direction! You won't even have a headache in the morning!

name: Srammy
description: Those pesky kids! "Like Bow Wow, like owner", or so they say... and that's fine by Srammy! He and his pet Skroobidoo are so similar that it's sometimes easy to mix them up! They're both terrified of Ghasts, for example, and in spite of his Ogrest-like appetite, Srammy is really just a bag of bones!

spells.effects: Pushes 2 .

powers:
Invisibility
( Invisibility: Srammy doesn't block lines of sight for characters who aren't adjacent to him. What's more, Srammy cannot take {ij} from character who is not adjacent to him.)

name: Oscar Kass
description: Steal the show Being the bad guy doesn't mean that you can't have fun! Oscar Kass's dream is to become one of the World's greatest petty thieves. There's no doubt about it; if there were an award for the best con man, Oscar would have already won it hands down!

spells.effects: Steals Health .
Pierces Armour .

powers: Armour

name: Fraktor
description: You won't be forgotten! This Sram is a formidable exterminator of vermin. As soon as he delves into the sewers, the rodents haven't got a chance - it's a real rat race!

spells.effects: Pushes 1 .
Places a LETHAL TRAP on the targeted empty cell.

powers: Dodge ,  Lock ,  {A} Resistance

name: Coa Gulary
description: Making blood boil For a long time, Coa Gulary was a big, fat, lazy lump. She would spend her days going with the flow, and when an enemy provoked her, she would just freeze, without even making the effort to get up. Until the day her laziness almost cost her life, that is... A horde of thirsty Moskitos had decided to bleed her dry! That certainly got her heart pumping! Since that day, whenever anyone gets too close to Coa Gulary, she's out for blood.

name: Anna Tommy
description: Hit 'em where it hurts This Sacrier has studied the human body such depth that she knows exactly where the weak points are! This skill has made her one of the most formidable, feared warriors in the World of Twelve. When she decides to strike, Anna Tommy literally atomises her enemies!

spells.effects: Switches position with the targeted character.
Switches position with the targeted ally character.

name: Clot the Crapulous
description: Blood, sweat and tears Clot the Crapulous, snotty and fabulous!

spells.effects: Pierces Armour .
Steals Health . Inflics +2 {W} on allies.
"Cross" area of effect.

powers:
Madness
( Madness: as long as Clot the Crapulous has at least 7{ij}, she gains Critical Hit, Armour, Dodge and Lock.)

name: Klor Ofil
description: Take a break Klor Ofil's mop looks just like the leaves on a tree, which is a major advantage when she wants to play hide-and-seek in the woods! It can sometimes prove pretty dangerous, however... Klor Ofil has stopped counting the number of times she's been mistaken for a plant or hedge... You wouldn't believe how often this little Sadida has to dodge a clumsy hack!

spells.effects: "Square" area of effect. -1 {MP} .
Places a MADOLL on the targeted empty cell.

powers: Dodge

name: Makum Bah
description: Feel the wrath! Every night this Sadida dances for the guzzling Pandawas at Madrestam Harbour who are only interested in drinking.

spells.effects: Pierces Armour .
Places a SACRIFICIAL DOLL on the targeted empty cell.
Makum Bah loses all her {MP} and {AP}.

powers: Critical Hit ,  {E} Resistance

name: Fern Sock'em
description: Sock it to 'em Ferm Sock'em is cute, but she's a real tough cookie! Her natural beauty has been known to hurt friends and enemies alike. But more often than not, you just need to hear her sing to want to bury her six kafeet under...

spells.effects: Places a BLOCK DOLL on the targeted empty cell.

name: Quentin Flush
description: Place your bets! This Ecaflip may come from Frigost, but he never gets cold feet. Putting his life on the line comes as second nature. Just like in a game of cards, sometimes you need to risk everything if you want to win the jackpot! That's why Quentin goes all in. He prowls around where danger lurks and always manages to get out while the going is good. His attitude has earned him respect from everyone, even his enemies. It's a safe bet that the feeling isn't mutual!

spells.effects: Play heads or tails 3 times: Tails: Quentin Flush suffers +1{ij}. Heads: inflicts +1 {W} .

name: Dani O'Shun
description: It's make-or-break time! There's only so much time you can spend liquidating your enemies before you find yourself high and dry. Dani O'Shun took a while to learn this... and before he knew it, he was out of his depth!

spells.effects: Play heads or tails: Tails: Dani loses all his {MP} and {AP}. Heads: Dani immediately gains +2 {AP} .
Play heads or tails to inflict +3 {A} .

powers: Lock ,  Dodge

name: Naz Rael
description: How now, Bow Meow? Naz Real learnt the art of combat from his spiritual master, Gargamoul. His weakness? He's allergic to Blue Jellies. As soon as he eats one, he sneezes involuntarily: "Hmmmurf!"

spells.effects: Moves Naz Rael to the targeted empty cell.

powers:
{F} Resistance ,  Claw Attack
( Claw Attack: when Naz Rael carries out a lock roll against an enemy, he automatically causes it +1{ij}.)

name: Percimol
description: Hammering it down Percimol is hardcore Taur tamer.

spells.effects: "Hammer" area of effect.
-1 {MP} . -1 {AP} .
Percimol immediately gains +6 {AP} .

powers:
{W} Resistance ,  Puddlage
( Puddlage: Percimol has Critical Hit, Armour, Dodge and Lock points against characters who can cast {W} spells.)

name: Shak Shaka
description: Pull some strings This King of the Robomats always has his finger on the button!

spells.effects: -1 {AP} . Play heads or tails to inflict +4 {E} .
Play heads or tails to immediately gain +5 {AP} .

powers:
Lock ,  Sticky Spray Can
( Sticky Spray Can: enemy characters adjacent to Shak Shaka will have to use 1{AP} more than usual to cast their spells.)

name: Goultard

spells.effects: "Cross" area of effect.
Inflicts +5 {F} against targets of level 5 or higher.
Moves 2 closer to the targeted character.
-1 {MP} . -1 {AP} .

powers:
Critical Hit ,  Goultarminator
( Goultarminator: every time he defeats another Krosmaster, Goultard heals himself by 3{ij}.)

name: Cloud Knight
description: Gone with the wind When Cloud is in the hood, a storm is normally brewing. His tempestuous character leads to blustering damage! As soon as his silhouette appears on the horizon, people run for cover. He'll kick up a storm come rain or shine.

spells.effects: The Cloud Knight immediately gains +1 {MP} , or +2 {MP} if there's an allied Knight in play.

powers: {A} Resistance

name: Drop Knight
description: Test the waters The Drop Knight is a prime example of never-ending energy. Put simply, one of his glares is enough to make your blood run cold, he's dripping with malice and he loves to make a splash!

spells.effects: -1 {AP} .
Heals +1{ij} extra if there's an allied Knight in play.

powers: {W} Resistance

name: Flame Knight
description: Twisted firestarter Everyone agrees: the Flame Knight knows how to make you sweat! His fiery mood can sometimes become quite suffocating... and he'll crumble your ploys to dust...! There's no point in crying because a few lousy tears won't extinguish his anger...

spells.effects: "Cross" area of effect.
The Flame Knight immediately gains +2 {AP} , or +3 {AP} if there's an allied Knight in play.

powers: {F} Resistance

name: Leaf Knight
description: Down to earth When the Leaf Knight besieges the Amaknian countryside, nature lovers don't stick around, but flee to nearby towns and villages! Why? Because this ferocious warrior makes them shake like leaves!

spells.effects: Steals Health .
-1 {MP} , or -2 {MP} if there is another allied knight in play.

powers: {E} Resistance

name: Darkness Knight

spells.effects: "Cross" area of effect.
-1 {AP} . Every Critical Hit counts as double.
-1 {MP} . Steals Health .

powers:
Armour ,  Master Knight
( Master Knight: the Darkness Knight takes on the powers of all the other Knights playing on his team.)

name: Argon Gass
description: Striving for Stasis After centuries spent skulling around the engulfed town of Sufokia, the robots are resurfacing and they're as hungry as ever for the Stasis crystals that can be found on land.

spells.effects: Pierces Armour .
+2 {AP} .

powers: Armour

name: Amalia
description: Princess Sheran Sharm As charming as she is capricious, Amalia can become savage if you try hold her back from adventure.

spells.effects: "Cross" area of effect.
Attracts 1 (only an ally).

powers:
Sadida's Blessing
( Sadida's Blessing: at the start of her furn, Amalia heals an ally from the Brotherhood of the Tofu by 2{ij}.)

name: Evangelyne
description: Unflinching archer Well trained in combat, Evangelyne remains unmoved by Percedal's boasting, Yugo's jokes, Ruel's low blows and Amalia's tantrums...

spells.effects: Pierces Armour .

powers:
Cover Fire
( Cover Fire: if one of her allies from the Brotherhood of the Tofu is in play, the max Range of Evangelyne's spells is increased by 1.)

name: Nox

spells.effects: Steals 1 {AP} from the target.
"Cross" area of effect.
Moves Nox to the targeted empty cell.

powers:
Armour ,  Eliacube Master
( Eliacube Master: whenever he inflicts 1{ij} or more on an enemy, Nox also makes it lose 1{AP})

name: Ruel Stroud
description: Fill those pockets with kamas Intrepid adventurer, bonus hunter, Gobbowl team coach, merchant and tour guide; Ruel is a real jack-of-all-trades!

spells.effects: Steals 1 {MP} from the target.

powers:
Old-Timer
( Old-Timer: if one of his allies from the Brotherhood of the Tofu is in play, Ruel gains Dodge and Armour.)

name: Percedal
description: Guardian of the Shushus Percedal's philosophy is pretty basic: you're either good or bad - there is no in-between.

spells.effects: Moves Percedal to the targeted empty cell.

powers:
Fire of Rubilax
( Fire of Rubilax: if one of his allies from the Brotherhood of the Tofu is in play, Percedal gains Critical Hit and Lock,)

name: Yugo
description: A heart as big as the World itself Yugo struggles to stand by and watch any form of injustice or ill-doing. Suffice to say, he's got a lot on his plate!

spells.effects: Moves Yugo or an ally adjacent to him onto the targeted empty cell.

powers:
Heroic Inspiration
( Heroic Inspiration: if one of his allies from the Brotherhood of the Tofu is in play, the costs of Yugo's spells are lowered by 1{AP}.)

name: Goultard the Barbarian

spells.effects: "Cross" area of effect.
Inflicts +2 {E} against targets of level 2 or lower.
Attracts 2 .
"Square" area of effect. Pierces Armour .

powers:
Armour ,  Demonic Range
( Demonic Range: for every 5{ij}, Goultard the Barbarian's spells gain 1 max Range.)

name: Count Frigost

spells.effects: "Hand" area of effect.
Inflicts +2 {A} extra damage on the targeted summons.
"Hammer" area of effect. Summons a SINISTRO on each free targeted cell (maximum 4 SINISTRO in play).
Attracts 3 .

powers:
Unfazed ,  Rolbak
( Rolbak: each time an opposing Krosmaster inflicts one or more {ij} on him, Count Frigost gains +1{AP} and loses -1{MP}) ,  Interior Fire
( Interior Fire: this character is immune to frost damage, frost AP loss and frost MP loss; if it were to receive, receives normal damage in their place. Frost damage can be healed like standard damage.)

name: Captain Amakna

spells.effects: -1 {AP} during the first Biceps this turn.
Moves 3 closer . Pierces Armour .
+2 {MP} . Ends Captain Amakna's turn.

powers:
{E} Resistance ,  {F} Resistance ,  Kronice
( Kronice: as long as Captain Amakna is in play, his Vigilante allies gain +1 max {HP} and his allies who are level 3 or above gain +1 max {MP} and +1 max {AP}.)

name: Merkator

spells.effects: "Shovel" area of effect. -1 {MP} . Retreats 1 .
"Cross" area of effect. Pierces Armour .
+1 {MP} . +4 {AP} . Attack spells used this turn inflict +1 {A} and +1 {W} .

powers:
{A} Resistance ,  {W} Resistance ,  Krobust
( Krobust: Merkator cannot suffer or be healed of more than 3{ij} at a time when he is affected by a spell.)

name: Count Harebourg

spells.effects: Pierces Armour . Steals Health .
Summon a SINISTRO to the targeted free cell.
Switch position with the targeted SINISTRO.

powers:
Unfazed ,  Pendulum

name: Lumino
description: Let there be light! Faster than light, Lumino is a speedy Vigilante who puts his adversaries in the limelight, and can neutralize them faster than you can say "Firefoux"!

spells.effects: Prosecution 6 : "Cross" area of effect, Pierces Armour .
Heals targeted Multiman by +2{ij}

powers:
Firefoux Blood
( Firefoux Blood: Prosecution 6: Lumino gains Armour, Counter-Attack and Resistance{EFWA}.)

name: Krobax
description: Owling Good Vigilante This Vigilante springs from the inky darkness and swoops towards adventure like a Crobak. His name he signs with the tip of his beak in the form of a "K" - for Krobax!

spells.effects: Prosecution 2 : -1 {MP} .
Switches position with the targeted Multiman.

powers:
Crobak Blood
( Crobak Blood: Prosecution 4: Krobax gains 3 max {AP}.)

name: Skale
description: A toothy Grin? Certain people say Skale got his teeth from his mom, which would explain his sharp grin and his natural allure.

spells.effects: Prosecution 3 : Moves 3 closer .
Play Heads or Tails: Tails: Steals 2 {MP} from targeted Multiman. Heads: Steals 3 {AP} from targeted Multiman.

powers:
Kralove Blood
( Kralove Blood: Prosecution 5: Skale's spells inflict +1{W}.)

name: Trank
description: Naturally Stout Wham! Bam! Trank's your man! Subtley is NOT Trank's middle name, and he's not afraid to slam an enemy when it's merited.

spells.effects: Prosecution 2 : "Shovel" area of effect. Attracts 1 .
+2 {MP} to targeted Multiman.

powers:
Treechnid Blood
( Treechnid Blood: Prosecution 5: Trank gains Unfazed, Armour and Lock.)

name: Beelzebug
description: Destroy All Pests! "One giant step on villainkind." The villains don't say much when Beelzebug is around. They don't have the time before he mashes them like bugs...

spells.effects: Prosecution 3 : -1 {AP} .
+3 {AP} to targeted Multiman.

powers:
Scaraleaf Blood
( Scaraleaf Blood: Prosecution 4: At the start of his turn, Beelzebug heals himself by 1{ij}.)

name: Shadow
description: Scorched Umber Shadow is a grim figure who feeds on evil desires. But why is he so evil? Probably because he was seduced by the dark side...

spells.effects: Revenge 2 : "Staff" area of effect, Steals Health .
Inflicts +2 {N} on the targeted Vigilante.

powers:
Darkness Blood
